channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A new law allows Israel to deport the relatives of attackers. Experts expect it to be struck down

item.title: A tiny grain of nuclear fuel is pulled from ruined Japanese nuclear plant, in a step toward cleanup

item.description: Trump has proposed featuring prayer in public schools and dismantling the Department of Education.

item.title: 2 Jewish DePaul students punched while showing support for Israel
item.description: The students suffered physical injuries, but declined medical treatment, according to the university.

item.title: Fed expected to cut interest rates days after election
item.description: The Fed is expected cut interest rates by a quarter of a percentage point.

item.title: Mysterious black balls that washed up on Sydney beach were foul-smelling mini ‘fatbergs’
